heading: HB05061
0: AN ACT EXEMPTING THE PATRONS OR THE CLIENTELLE OF TENANTS AND LESSEES OF SHOPPING MALLS, MARKETS, SHOPS, FAIRS, HOSPITALS AND ALL OTHER SIMILAR ESTABLISHMENTS FROM THE PAYMENT OF PARKING FEES ON A VALIDATION BASIS AND PROVIDING PENALTIES FOR A VIOLATION THEREOF
